column4: I trying to access my data via ecryptfs-mount-private. What's my login passphrase suppose to be?
Is there a difference between password and passphrase?
I'm trying to access my data via ecryptfs-mount-private. What's my login passphrase suppose to be?
When you set up the ecrypt-mount-thingy, I distinctly remember it would give you a long passphrase after the end of the setup.
yeah the encryption key
What did you do recently? :<
you think you can help me with this?
Not really. What does the error say specifically?
Err, use http://pastebin.com/
ls -al /home/ -- Paste one line with your name in it.
ok let me try that in terminal
Okay.
ok I did that and got a page of text
what do I do now?
Feed the information to this channel --> http://pastebin.com/
how can I copy text info from tt1?
*how can I copy text info from tty1?
In TTY1? Hmm. The easy way would be to install pastebinit.
ok thanks
sudo aptitude install pastebinit && ls -la /home | pastebinit
ok cool
